name: The Experiment (itch) (StevannusLake)
description:
You are an experimental robot with human behavior in it that is intended for science experiments and now you need to escape because of other robots failure systems that become very deadly and can cost millions of lives. You must successfully collect the secret chip that stored in a room at the eRobot Laboratory Center and you only have the last five minutes to save the world. As it takes place at a laboratory center , the place will be a fairly large place , many rooms and there will be some deadly robots that are guarding the place . 

This project was created for assignment purpose. All assets are captured from Free Unreal Engine Assets and Royalty Free Assets.
